alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:22PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Collier, northern Miami-Dade and Broward Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 422 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Dade-Collier Training Airport, or 30 miles west of Pembroke Pines, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Miccosukee Indian Reservation, Miccosukee Service Plaza and Big Cypress National Preserve. LIGHTNING...EXCESSIVE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County
